name: Slime Time [7DRL]
description:
our first attempt at a 7 day jam 

Art created by Kathryn Johnson https://www.artstation.com/kj_arts

goal of the game is to find the key for the boss room, defeat the boss, the move to the next level, repeat to get to the highest level you can before dying.

levels are randomly generated, and each level gets larger the higher the level, and boss gets more health points.

Controls 

Keyboard

WASD - move

Directional arrows to use connected ability

Controller

Left Stick or Dpad - move 

face buttons to use connected ability

Abilities

Up - Sword Stab

Left - hammer slam

Right - shoot projectile 

Down - block
